about_the_game:
~ Stumbling upon a dusty relic, the player discovers an ancient scroll with a whole world of ancient myths, landscapes, and creatures sealed inside. The player helps these sealed creatures come back to life, build them a home, and explore the hidden stories in the scroll with them. ~

Scrollden is an indie home-building simulation inspired by fantastic creatures in ancient Chinese mythologies. Instead of fierce beasts as documented in the myths, these creatures are turned into cute companions of the player on this deserted island.

While fulfilling the needs of these creatures in a casual building mode, the player sends them back to the scroll to explore the downfall of the mythological world and rescue other trapped creatures.
